# Witty Repartee (Trait)
## Overview
**Witty Repartee (Kitharodian Academy):** You are quick with your tongue and have always possessed the talent to quickly admonish your enemies. You gain a +1 trait bonus on [[Bluff (Skill)|Bluff]] checks and [[Bluff (Skill)|Bluff]] is a class skill for you.

**Source:** Faction Guide, pg. 62
